testsuite.name: Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'apple'

testcase.name: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'apple'

testcase.name: When the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'apple'

testcase.name: Then they should see the definition 'A common, round frt produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'apple'

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: a collection containing a string containing "A common, round frt produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates." but: was "A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates. [from 9th c.] quotations ▼", was "", was "", was "", was "Any of various tree-borne fruits or vegetables especially considered as resembling an apple; also (with qualifying words) used to form the names of other specific fruits such as custard apple, rose apple, thorn apple etc. [from 9th c.] quotations ▼", was "", was "", was "", was "The fruit of the Tree of Knowledge, eaten by Adam and Eve according to post-Biblical Christian tradition; the forbidden fruit. [from 11th c.] quotations ▼", was "", was "", was "A tree of the genus Malus, especially one cultivated for its edible fruit; the apple tree. [from 15th c.] quotations ▼", was "", was "", was "", was "", was "The wood of the apple tree. [from 19th c.]", was "(in the plural, Cockney rhyming slang) Short for apples and pears, slang for stairs. [from 20th c.]", was "(baseball, slang, obsolete) The ball in baseball. [from 20th c.]", was "(informal) When smiling, the round, fleshy part of the cheeks between the eyes and the corners of the mouth.", was "(pejorative, ethnic slur) A Native American or red-skinned person who acts and/or thinks like a white (Caucasian) person. quotations ▼", was "", was ""
